text: Spegazziniophytum is a plant genus of the family Euphorbiaceae first described as a genus in 2001.Radcliffe-Smith, Alan. 2001. in Genera EuphorbiacearumTropicos, Spegazziniophytum Esser It contains only one known species, Spegazziniophytum patagonicum, endemic to Argentina (Provinces of Mendoza, Neuquén, Chubut, Santa Cruz).Tropicos, specimen list for Spegazziniophytum patagonicum (Speg.) Esser ==References== Category:Hippomaneae Category:Monotypic Euphorbiaceae genera Category:Endemic flora of Argentina
title: Spegazziniophytum
